scripts.dev: node generate-script.js && stmux -M true -- [ [ -s 1 -t "micro-proxy 9000" "cat proxy.json | jq -c .rules[] && sleep 5 && micro-proxy -r proxy.json -p 9000" .. -t curl "zsh" .. -t "npm ./www/ 3000" "cd ./www/ &&  npm run dev" ] : [ -t "micro-dev ./api/recentPosts/ 3001" "cd ./api/recentPosts/ &&  MONGO_CONNECTION="$MONGO_CONNECTION" MONGO_WRITER_PASSWORD="$MONGO_WRITER_PASSWORD" DEBUG="$DEBUG" GCP_STORAGE_CREDENTIALS="$GCP_STORAGE_CREDENTIALS" JWT_SECRET="$JWT_SECRET" micro-dev -sp 3001 -w . -w ../common ." .. -t "micro-dev ./api/post/ 3002" "cd ./api/post/ &&  MONGO_CONNECTION="$MONGO_CONNECTION" MONGO_WRITER_PASSWORD="$MONGO_WRITER_PASSWORD" DEBUG="$DEBUG" GCP_STORAGE_CREDENTIALS="$GCP_STORAGE_CREDENTIALS" JWT_SECRET="$JWT_SECRET" micro-dev -sp 3002 -w . -w ../common ." .. -t "micro-dev ./api/user/ 3003" "cd ./api/user/ &&  MONGO_CONNECTION="$MONGO_CONNECTION" MONGO_WRITER_PASSWORD="$MONGO_WRITER_PASSWORD" DEBUG="$DEBUG" GCP_STORAGE_CREDENTIALS="$GCP_STORAGE_CREDENTIALS" JWT_SECRET="$JWT_SECRET" micro-dev -sp 3003 -w . -w ../common ." ] ]
